bibitem.title: ITU-T L.163 (11/2018): Criteria for optical cable installation with minimal existing infrastructure
bibitem.abstract: Recommendation ITU-T L.163 describescriteria for the installation of optical fibre cables defined in [ITU-TL.110] in remote areas withlack of usual infrastructure for installation including the procedures ofcable-route planning, cable selection, cable-installation scheme selection,cable tension and temperature consideration, and the handling, bend protectionand river/lake closing of the cable together with pilot tests and training forinstallation.ThisRecommendation also describes how to mitigate the considerable risks and/orissues to which the optical fibre cable may be exposed when infrastructures areminimal during installation, maintenance and operation procedures.
